Title: A Jailbird, Invalid, Martyr, Cutter, Retard, and Parasitic Twin
Writer: John Wells (developer), Paul Abbott (creator), Nancy Pimental, Lisa Morales (staff writer)
Actors: William H. Macy, Emmy Rossum, Jeremy Allen White, Ethan Cutkosky
Plot: Fiona goes on trial for her felony charge. An angry Lip tries to keep the family from falling apart. Sammy uses extreme methods to soothe Frank's pain. V and Kevin get big news.
